alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield; Northern New Haven; Southern Fairfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 21 at 5:49PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Fairfield, northwestern New Haven, northern Westchester, eastern Putnam, Queens, western Suffolk and Nassau Counties through 645 PM EST... At 547 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brewster, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Islip, Bridgeport, Stamford, Waterbury, Norwalk, Danbury, Brentwood, Milford, Levittown, Freeport, Shelton, Valley Stream, Commack, Long Beach and Huntington Station. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH

area.areaDesc: Northern Fairfield; Northern New Haven; Southern Fairfield
